description:
Tree Works Application in Bunhill Fields & Finsbury Square Conservation Area, Bunhill Fields Burial Ground, City Road, Islington, London EC1Y 2BG

A tree application has been received to do the following work to trees within: Bunhill Fields Burial Ground, City Road

X1- Prunus Avium, (Wild Cherry) Fell to ground level and replace with Ostrya carpinifolia,

X1- Quercus robur (English Oak) reduce lateral branch to give 2.5 – metre clearance to building.

X1 – Platanus x Hispanica (London Plane) clean stem, removing all epicormic growth, prune to give 2.5 – 3 metres clearance from building.

X1 – Tilia europaea (Lime) prune to give 2.5 – 3 metres clearance from building.

X1 – Acer pseudoplatanus (Sycamore) prune to give 2.5 – 3 metres clearance from building.

X1 – Platanus x hispanica (London Plane) prune to give 2.5 – 3 metres clearance from building.

X1 – Platanus x hispanica (London Plane) remove broken branches. Remove Major deadwood in excess of 25 mm diameter. 

X1 – Platanus x hispanica (London Plane) crown lift to 5.8 metre over road, remove branches that is overhanging tree lights and signage. . Remove Major deadwood in excess of 25 mm diameter. 

X1- – Platanus x hispanica (London Plane) crown lift to 5.8 metre over road, remove branches that is overhanging tree lights and signage. . Remove Major deadwood in excess of 25 mm diameter.
